00162

00165  
00167       double cutoff_;
00168 
00170       double coeff_;
00171

00183    // inline methods 
00184  
00185    /* 
00186    * Calculate repulsive potential energy for particle of type i.
00187    *
00188    * 7.905694 = 25/sqrt(10), which is the negative of the minimum of the
00189    * unshifted 9-3 potential.
00190    */
00191    inline double SlitExternal::energy(double d, int type) const
00192    {
00193       if (d < cutoff_) {
00194          double r3i;
00195          r3i = d * d * d;
00196          if (r3i < 0.129615*sigmaCb_) r3i = 0.129615 * sigmaCb_;
00197          r3i = sigmaCb_ / r3i;
00198          return coeff_ * (r3i*(r3i*r3i - 7.5) + 7.905694);
00199       } else {
00200          return 0.0;
00201       }
00202    }
00203    
00204    /* 
00205    * Calculate external potential energy for a single atom.
00206    */
00207    inline double SlitExternal::energy(const Vector& position, int type) const
00208    {
00209       double d = position[2];
00210       double halfL = boundaryPtr_->lengths()[2] * 0.5;
00211       if (d > halfL) d = halfL + halfL - d;
00212       return energy(d, type);
00213    }
00214    
00215    /* 
00216    * Calculate force for a particle as a function of distance to boundary.
00217    */
00218    inline double SlitExternal::forceScalar(double d, int i) const
00219    {
00220       if (d < cutoff_) {
00221          double r3i;
00222          r3i = d * d * d;
00223          if (r3i < 0.129615 * sigmaCb_) r3i = 0.129615 * sigmaCb_;
00224          r3i = sigmaCb_ / r3i;
00225          return coeff_ * (9.0*r3i*r3i - 22.5) * r3i / d;
00226       } else {
00227          return 0.0;
00228       }
00229    }
00230 
00231    /* 
00232    * Calculate external force for a single atom.
00233    */
00234    inline void 
00235    SlitExternal::getForce(const Vector& position, int type, Vector& force) const
00236    {
00237       double d = position[2];
00238       double halfL = boundaryPtr_->lengths()[2] * 0.5;
00239       double scalarf;
00240       if (d > halfL) {
00241          d = halfL + halfL - d;
00242          scalarf = forceScalar(d, type);
00243          force = Vector(0.0, 0.0, -scalarf);
00244       } else {
00245          scalarf = forceScalar(d, type);
00246          force = Vector(0.0, 0.0, scalarf);
00247       }
00248    }
00249  
00250 }
